org.rx.reactive
Class Notification<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.rx.reactive.Notification<T>

public class Notification<T>
extends java.lang.Object

An object representing a notification sent to a Observable. For the Microsoft Rx equivalent see: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh229462(v=vs.103).aspx
